com.cloudera.cdk.data.hbase.avro
Interface AvroRecordBuilder<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of record to build.
public interface AvroRecordBuilder<T>

An builder interface used to construct Avro records. The Avro entity mapper types must create Avro records, of which there are multiple classes. One class of Avro record is GenericRecord. Another is SpecificRecord. These are constructed in different ways. For each class of avro record supported by the entity mappers, there should be an AvroRecordBuilder implementation.

Method Summary
 T build()
          Build the avro record.
 void put(String field, Object value)
          Add a value to a field of an avro record.
